column1: Section 365B (2) b (2) of the Penal Code carries following sentence:
(b)  Commits  grave  sexual  abuse  on  any  person  under  eighteen  years  of
age, shall be punished with rigorous imprisonment for a term not less than
seven years and not exceeding twenty years and with fine and shall also
be ordered to pay compensation of an amount determined by court to the
person  in  respect  of  whom  the  offence  was  committed  for  the  injuries
